survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Corporate Wellness Retreats Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on corporate wellness retreats to assess satisfaction levels and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience of the corporate wellness retreat?

questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity and ease of analysis.
